settings.title: Account settings
settings.subtitle: Personalize your account experience and keep your information secure from one convenient place.

profile.title: Profile preferences
profile.description: Update your name, avatar, language, and other details that appear to your teammates.

security.title: Security & privacy
security.description: Review active sessions, enable multi-factor authentication, and manage connected applications.

form.description: Update your password to keep your account secure. We'll email you a confirmation link to finish the process.
form.emailInfo: Reset instructions will be sent to {email}.

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.description: Choose how you are notified about activity via email, push alerts, or in-app messages.

tips.title: Need assistance?
tips.description: Visit the Help Center below for step-by-step guides or contact our support team if you get stuck.

help.title: Help Center
help.subtitle: Find answers fast with curated documentation, frequently asked questions, and community discussions.

explanation.title: What is Bro World?
explanation.description: Bro World centralizes your team's communication, knowledge, and workflows so you can stay focused on delivering value.

highlights.workspace: Organize projects, documents, and discussions in dedicated workspaces for each initiative.
highlights.collaboration: Collaborate in real time with shared notes, integrated messaging, and timely notifications.
highlights.support: Monitor progress from interactive dashboards and reach our team whenever you need guidance.
highlights.automation: Automate repetitive tasks with orchestration recipes that trigger actions across your tools.
highlights.integrations: Connect Bro World with GitHub, Slack, Figma, and dozens of partners to keep data flowing.
highlights.aiAssistant: Use the AI companion for instant summaries, drafting updates, and suggesting next steps.

guides.title: Product guides
guides.description: Browse illustrated tutorials to learn the basics and discover advanced workflows.

faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.description: See the solutions to the most common topics our users ask about every day.

community.title: Community forum
community.description: Join conversations with other members, share tips, and vote on feature requests.

automation.title: Automation library
automation.description: Explore ready-made playbooks that connect workflows, approvals, and reporting in minutes.

updates.title: Release updates
updates.description: Review the latest product announcements, roadmap highlights, and beta opportunities.

accountAccess.question: How do I access my account?
accountAccess.answer: Sign in with the email you used to register. If you run into issues, reset your password from the login page or reach out to support.

inviteTeam.question: Can I invite my teammates?
inviteTeam.answer: Yes. Open your workspace settings, choose "Members," and send invitations by email to collaborate instantly.

getSupport.question: Where can I get more help?
getSupport.answer: Browse the guides above for step-by-step tutorials or contact us directly and we will follow up with tailored assistance.

automationTemplates.question: How do I enable the new automation templates?
automationTemplates.answer: Open the Automation Library from the Help Center, choose a recipe, and map each step to the integrations connected to your workspace.

mobileAccess.question: Is there a mobile experience?
mobileAccess.answer: Yes. Install the iOS or Android app to receive push notifications, approve workflows, and chat with teammates on the go.

billing.question: Where can I manage billing settings?
billing.answer: Admins can visit Settings → Billing to update payment methods, download invoices, or adjust plan seats at any time.

contact.title: Still need help?
contact.description: Send us a message through the contact page, start a live chat, or book a success session with our specialists.

ecommerceThankYou.heroSubtitle: You have successfully placed an order.
ecommerceThankYou.emptyItems: No items were found in this order.
ecommerceThankYou.noOrder: We could not display your order details.
ecommerceThankYou.missingToken: We could not find your order without a confirmation token.
ecommerceThankYou.loadError: We could not load your order details. Please try again.

about.title: About Bro World
about.subtitle: Explore the feature-rich platform that powers Bro World across teams, products, and communities.
about.intro: Bro World has grown into a unified digital workspace that merges community, content publishing, messaging, and automation in one cohesive experience.
about.mission: Our mission is to help teams prototype quickly, launch faster, and manage daily operations with confidence through modular building blocks.
about.vision: From AI-assisted workflows to real-time collaboration dashboards, every feature is designed to stay adaptable as your organization evolves.

frontend.title: Frontend experience
frontend.description: Nuxt 3, Vue 3, TypeScript, and Vuetify 3 power an accessible interface with micro-frontends, offline caching, and responsive design that feels fast on every device.

backend.title: Backend foundation
backend.description: Node.js services orchestrate queues, WebSockets, search indexing, and PostgreSQL persistence behind the scenes.

api.title: Symfony microservices
api.description: Decoupled Symfony API microservices expose secure REST and GraphQL endpoints along with turnkey integrations and webhooks.

realtime.title: Real-time collaboration
realtime.description: Live presence, shared commenting, and WebSocket events keep teams aligned as updates roll out in seconds.

automation.title: Automation & intelligence
automation.description: Background jobs, AI assistants, and scheduled workflows eliminate repetitive work and surface next-best actions.

devops.title: DevOps & security
devops.description: Infrastructure-as-code pipelines, containerized deployments, and continuous security scanning protect every release.

collaboration.title: Workspace collaboration
collaboration.description: Multi-tenant workspaces, role-based permissions, and shared calendars support distributed teams.

analytics.title: Actionable analytics
analytics.description: Interactive dashboards, exportable reports, and unified metrics reveal product health in seconds.

customization.title: Deep customization
customization.description: Theme builder, extension hooks, and granular settings let you adapt every surface to your brand.

marketplace.title: Ecosystem marketplace
marketplace.description: Curated plugins, integration kits, and open APIs accelerate new feature delivery.

callToAction.title: Build with Bro World
callToAction.description: Ready to extend the platform or connect your stack? Reach out and let's blueprint the next generation of features together.

contact.title: Contact us
contact.subtitle: We are here to answer your questions and guide you toward the right solutions.

support.title: Customer support
support.description: Get technical assistance, report issues, or request account changes with our dedicated team.

partnerships.title: Partnerships
partnerships.description: Discuss integrations, co-marketing opportunities, or tailored enterprise packages.

press.title: Press & media
press.description: Request interviews, logos, or press kits to feature Bro World in your publication.

details.title: How to reach us
details.description: Send an email to {email} or open a support ticket from your dashboard. We respond within one business day.

form.title: Send us a message
form.description: Share a few details about your request and we'll connect you with the right specialist.

status.success: Thank you! Your message was sent successfully.
status.error: Something went wrong. Please try sending your message again.

location.title: Visit us in Cologne
location.description: Find our team at our office in Cologne, Germany.

send.title: Send a notification
send.subtitle: Compose and send a notification to a recipient or group immediately or at a scheduled time.

hints.channel: Select the channel that will be used to send this notification.
hints.scope: Optional scope for the notification (INDIVIDUAL, GLOBAL, WORKPLACE, SEGMENT).
hints.sendAfter: Choose a future date to delay the delivery or leave empty to send immediately.
hints.scopeTarget: Provide a JSON object describing the target audience for scoped notifications.
hints.topic: Optional topic identifier used by the push provider.
hints.recipients: Provide a JSON array or string representing the recipients.
hints.emailRecipientsCc: Optional carbon copy recipients as JSON array or string.
hints.emailRecipientsBcc: Optional blind carbon copy recipients as JSON array or string.
hints.emailRecipientsReplyTo: Optional reply-to recipients as JSON array or string.
hints.templateId: Use the template ID to render the email with predefined content.

batch.title: Send batch notifications
batch.subtitle: Dispatch a notification to multiple recipients with a single request.

hints.channel: Select the notification channel for this batch request.
hints.scope: Optional scope for the notification (INDIVIDUAL, GLOBAL, WORKPLACE, SEGMENT).
hints.sendAfter: Choose a future date to delay the delivery or leave empty to send immediately.
hints.recipients: Provide a JSON array or string describing the batch recipients.
hints.templateId: Use the template ID to render the email with predefined content.

notifications.failed: Unable to submit the batch notification request.

hints.identifier: Use the slug or ID of the world.
hints.list: Use commas or line breaks to separate values.

validation.pluginsRequired: At least one plugin identifier is required.
validation.membersRequired: At least one member identifier is required.
